item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

Announcing the April, 2013 Boston Karaoke Meetup.

We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM. Courtside has over 70,000 karaoke songs in its library for you to choose from.  We will have Mark the Shark as our KJ host and he always tries to do a good job.

I am using Paypal to collect the fees in advance.  I am disabling guests to make sure I can create a Name Tag for everyone.  If you have a guest, please have them register and RSVP for themselves.  Make sure your name and photo on the Meetup Website are correct to drive proper Name Tag creation.

Please be aware, refunds are provided only if you cancel at least 7 days prior to the event.

I am limiting the number of attendees, so to make sure you have  a spot, please sign up early.  Last month, several members were not able to join us because they signed up too late.

Your Karaoke Host,
-Phil

PS: To help you plan for Karaoke Meetups, here are the planned future dates at this time (all subject to change).

May 4, 2013

June, 2013 TBD
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - April, 2013
